verses.text: Mamin Jehová, manh ak' in yaelal yuj yowal a k'ool. Manh ak' in yaelal yacb'an aycot a k'ak'alk'olal.
Toxo ix och tzolan a jul-lab' t'ayin, ix ak'och in yaelal.
Ha yuj yowal a k'ool chi', masanil in niwanil tik te ya' ay swab'i, yujnhej to ix och in mul t'ayach.
Ha in chukal ichato k'ojank'e t'a wib'anh icha icatz, maxtzac techajlaj wuuj.
Yujnhej in pital, wanxo sk'e sjab' wechen yujto wan sk'ab'ati.
nhojan in emi tzin b'eyi. Junelnhej lachan waji. Maxtzac och waan jab'oc in cusk'olal.
Van in cham yuj q'uixwelal swab'i. Masanil in niwanil te ya ay swab'i.
Ix te b'uychaj in niwanil tik, manhxalaj jab'oc yip. Tzin k'acwi yuj wilk'olal.
Mamin Vajalil, ojtac masanil tas tzin nib'ej. Ayic sik'son sja in k'ool, ichanh yaj jun tik.
Toxonhej ste tinhtinhan in pixan yab'an syail. Numumi yel wip, maxtzac yal-laj wilani.
Ha heb' anima wach' wak'an yet'oc yet' heb' junnhej tzin ek' yet'oc, najat sb'esel sb'a heb' t'ayin. Ha heb' cajan t'a in lak'anil, najat sb'esel sb'a heb' t'ayin yuj in yaelal.
Ha heb' snib'ej in smilanchamoc, wan yak'anem in yaalil heb'. Ha heb' snib'an yak' chukal t'ayin, anhej chukal syal heb' t'a in patic. Max ochlaj waan heb' snaub'tanhan tas ol in yutoc t'a elk'altac.
Ha inxo pax jun, ichato macan in chiquin, max wab'laj tas syal heb', ichato max ujilaj in loloni, malaj tas tz'elta t'a in ti'.
Lajan in icha junok mach max yab'laj, max yal-laj yalan sb'a.
Mamin Jehová in Diosal, a achnhej tzach wak'och yipoc in k'ool, a ach ol in a tak'wej.
Ha jun tik tzin k'an t'ayach: Mocab' in stzetzej heb' ajk'ol chi'. Mocab' b'itan heb' yuj tzalajk'olal tato tzin ak'ji ganar.
Palta ijanxo wal tzin ak'ji ganar swab'i. Max och waan jab'oc in yaelal tik.
Ol walk'eta in mul. Manhxo in animaoc swab' yuj in chukal.
Ha heb' ajk'ol snib'ej in chami, toxo ix te q'uib' sb'isul heb'. Manhxo jantacoc ix te aj heb' tzin chacani, wach'chom malaj in mul t'a heb'.
Chucnhej syutej sb'a heb' t'ayin yuj in wach'k'olal t'a heb'. Yujnhej to tzin b'eyb'alej wach'il, tz'och heb' ajk'olal t'ayin.
Mamin Jehová, manh in actejcani. Ach in Diosal, manh a b'esel a b'a t'ayin.
Ach Vajalil, ach in Kolumal, cotanh t'a elanhchamel tzin a colani.
